column1: Question: What is the sum of the reciprocals of the natural-number factors of 6?
3o-mini: The natural-number factors of 6 are 1, 2, 3, and 6. Their reciprocals are 1, 1/2, 1/3, and 1/6, respectively. Adding these together:
To combine the fractions, you can use a common denominator (which is 6):
So, the sum of the reciprocals of the natural-number factors of 6 is 2.
